title: Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts: Flat Stanley
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Flat Stanley              Calling all Flat People!         Several of our Flat Rangers that have come for a tour. NPS Photo  Have you read Flat Stanley by Jeff Brown? It is the story of a boy who is flattened by a bulletin board. Because he is flat, he can travel by mail (which costs a lot less than traveling by plane or car). Like Flat Stanley, Flat Rangers travel across the country by mail. They can visit America's National Parks and send home pictures and information about all the places they see. Are you looking for a great destination to send your Flat Stanley? Then look no further than Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts. We are the nation's only national park for the performing arts. Our rangers would love to share our history and all that makes Wolf Trap so special with your Flat Stanley or Flat Ranger.   By sending Flat Stanley or Flat Ranger to Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts you'll be guaranteed your little friend will get the VIP treatment while exploring the park.   A ranger will be Stanley's personal guide during the visit to the park. The highlights of the trip will be the two performance venues, the Filene Center and  the Children's Theatre-in-the-Woods, and other areas around the park. You will get photographs of Stanley's visit and information about Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts. Include your e-mail address and you can get your pictures digitally. Simply send Flat Stanley with your name and address to: Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts Interpretation Office 1551 Trap Road Vienna, VA 22182 Get a Flat Ranger Template
